name: dbName
description: in this table, this is always 'active', referring to the default/main database at the GDC

name: file_gdc_id
description: GDC file uuid

name: access
description: either 'open' or 'controlled'

name: acl
description: if access is 'controlled', this field contains the dbGaP accession, eg phs000178

name: analysis_input_file_gdc_ids
description: if applicable, GDC file uuids for input file(s)

name: analysis_workflow_link
description: if applicable, link to GDC workflow on github

name: analysis_workflow_type
description: if applicable, workflow name eg 'STAR 2-Pass'

name: archive_gdc_id
description: if applicable/available, GDC archive uuid

name: archive_revision
description: archive revision number

name: archive_state
description: archive state

name: archive_submitter_id
description: original archive name, eg 'nationwidechildrens.org_BRCA.bio.Level_1.56'

name: associated_entities__case_gdc_id
description: GDC case uuid for associated case(s)

name: associated_entities__entity_gdc_id
description: GDC entity uuid for associated entity(ies)

name: associated_entities__entity_submitter_id
description: submitter id for associated entity(ies)

name: associated_entities__entity_type
description: associated entity type, eg 'aliquot' or 'case'

name: case_gdc_id
description: GDC case uuid

name: project_dbgap_accession_number
description: project dbGaP accession number, eg phs000467

name: project_disease_type
description: project disease type, eg 'Breast Invasive Carcinoma'

name: project_name
description: project name -- frequently the same as or similar to disease type

name: program_dbgap_accession_number
description: program dbGaP accession number, eg phs000178

name: program_name
description: program name, eg TCGA or TARGET

name: project_short_name
description: project abbreviation, eg TCGA-BRCA or TARGET-ALL-P2

name: created_datetime
description: timestamp of creation, eg 2016-10-27T21:58:12.297090-05:00

name: data_category
description: eg 'Simple Nucleotide Variation', 'Transcriptome Profiling', etc

name: data_format
description: eg TXT, VCF, BAM, TSV, etc

name: data_type
description: eg 'Aligned Reads', 'Raw Simple Somatic Mutation', etc

name: downstream_analyses__output_file_gdc_ids
description: if applicable, semicolon-separated list of GDC file uuids

name: downstream_analyses__workflow_link
description: if applicable, link to GDC workflow(s) on github

name: downstream_analyses__workflow_type
description: if applicalbe, name of GDC workflow, eg 'VarScan2 Annotation'

name: experimental_strategy
description: eg WXS, RNA-Seq, 'Genotyping Array', etc

name: file_name
description: name of file at the GDC

name: file_size
description: size of file in bytes

name: file_id
description: duplicate of file_gdc_id

name: index_file_gdc_id
description: if applicable, GDC file uuid for index file

name: index_file_name
description: if applicable, GDC file name for index file

name: index_file_size
description: if applicable, size of index file in bytes

name: md5sum
description: md5sum for GDC data file

name: platform
description: platform used to generate this data, eg 'Illumina', or 'Affymetrix SNP 6.0'

name: file_state
description: file state, always 'released'

name: file_submitter_id
description: original submitter file id

name: file_type
description: eg 'aligned_reads', 'simple_somatic_mutation', 'gene_expression', etc

name: updated_datetime
description: timestamp of latest update, eg 2017-03-04T16:37:26.081298-06:00
